title: Provided further that in case of combined development of comprehensive transport hub interalia bus/truck terminus along with the Commercial development, then area of the parking of vehicles including areas required for maneuverability of vehicles of bus or truck terminus shall be allowed free of FSI
clause_text: Provided further that in case of combined development of comprehensive transport hub interalia bus/truck terminus along with the Commercial development, then area of the parking of vehicles including areas required for maneuverability of vehicles of bus or truck terminus shall be allowed free of FSI.
